Name: soy-based resin production | polyester resin, unsaturated | EN15804GD, S
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2013:Manufacture of plastics and synthetic rubber in primary forms
Description: Process description: resin produced by reacting refined soybean oil, ethanol, and other materials.  Water and ethanol distillates produced in the process are burned through an oxidizer. The activity ends with the reacted resin being diluted in styrene to produce the mixture, ready to be shipped to customers.  Current technology for one manufacturer; unknown how representative this product is amongst all soy resins.;of this nature available in the marketplace.
